DM SAF Fairing

Edited May 25 by Beale

On the topic of what stuff could be revamped I personally have a couple suggestions for smaller ones that idk if anyone else has thought of...

The first is the Dorado Fuel Vent which I just think could use a slightly updated model so it blends better with the new R-7 parts (maybe also a venting particle effect if at all possible but that's a secondary thing)

The other one is the antennas (the Octans and Atria ones specifically). My issue with these isn't really the appearances, more that they can be very hard to use in certain circumstances due to the limited set of angles they can deploy at. For me the biggest headache has been the Atria-Octans Basic HGA because it takes up a lot of space when it's folded which works fine on Soyuz but for things like Salyut it has to be placed pretty far down in order to not have it overhanging over the front and forcing the fairing to be awkwardly tall. I think this could be solved just by giving this antenna an option for an inverted deploy direction. (also I think the aft Kurs docking antenna from Soyuz-T/TM/TMA would be a good addition)

I am guessing the second thing would require a lot of tedious rigging work for the deploy animations so I understand if that isn't really something you would want to do.

 

Sorry for the long post and I hope I didn't come off too much like I was just complaining, these are just suggestions. I'm really excited seeing all the new stuff that's being worked on. c:

DM SAF Fairing

btw can i suggest u to make them on the real mesurments
like that fairing would be 2.75m instead of 2.5m (what it looks like) bc from what i found that fairing irl is 4.35m just a tad bit over proton that is 4.1m also makes space for a possible briz-m revamp cuz briz is exactly the diameter of proton so it would be 2.5m and a bigger fairing would allow it to fit in without beeing underscaled

There were some variants that flew with a fairing exactly the size of block D so one like that would be cool too

12 hours ago, Kochi said:

btw can i suggest u to make them on the real mesurments
like that fairing would be 2.75m instead of 2.5m (what it looks like) bc from what i found that fairing irl is 4.35m just a tad bit over proton that is 4.1m also makes space for a possible briz-m revamp cuz briz is exactly the diameter of proton so it would be 2.5m and a bigger fairing would allow it to fit in without beeing underscaled

There were some variants that flew with a fairing exactly the size of block D so one like that would be cool too

 

You have the wrong fairing, this is the DM-A / B fairing, not DMD+ - only 3.9m diameter.

There are 2 variants of this, one standard for 2.5m / Size 2, and another for the Blok D at 2.25m / Size 1.8

Tantares LV 16.0 for KSP 1.12.5
https://github.com/Tantares/TantaresLV/releases/tag/v16.0

TantaresSAF 3.0 for KSP 1.12.5
https://github.com/Tantares/TantaresSAF/releases/tag/v3.0

This release of TantaresLV includes the Proton and new Blok-D. TantaresSAF includes the new Proton DM-A/B fairing.
This was a fun project, and I hope to see some great shots of the Proton doing its thing.

It's uncanny how easy it is

On 4/27/2024 at 1:41 PM, Zyfle said:

I have a small request. Would it be possible to make the Vostok/Voskhod service module into a fairing base?

Back in the day, early versions of tantares the vostok avionics had this feature, i want this too so i added back myself with this module manager patch.

Spoiler

///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
/////////////////////////////Fairing fix for vostok/voskhod by Constel4cion

@PART[andromeda_avionics_s1_1]
{
    MODULE
    {
    name = ModuleProceduralFairing
        
    nSides = 48
    nArcs = 2
    nCollidersPerXSection = 9
    TextureURL = Tantares/parts/misc_fairings/texture_fairing_white
        
    panelGrouping = 3
    pivot = 0,-0.14375,0
    axis = 0,1,0
        
    baseRadius = 0.675
    maxRadius = 1.25
    capRadius = 0.15
    snapThreshold = 0.1
        
    xSectionHeightMin = 0.3
    xSectionHeightMax = 3
        
    edgeSlide = 0.075
    edgeWarp = 0.01
    noseTip = 0.5
        
    UnitAreaMass = 0.012
    UnitAreaCost = 12
        
    stagingToggleEnabledEditor = True
    stagingToggleEnabledFlight = True
    stagingEnableText = Fairing Not Staged
    stagingDisableText = Fairing Staged

    useClamshell = True
    }
    
}

Edited May 29 by Constel4cion
